[DQC.US.0082.9295] The filer has used the element VariableInterestEntityConsolidatedCarryingAmountAssets to report a value of 0 in the filing. The filer should use the element Assets with the axis ConsolidatedEntitiesAxis and the member VariableInterestEntityPrimaryBeneficiaryMember to indicate the portion of the balance sheet category that is applicable to consolidated VIE's.
